18#include <config.h>
19
20/* Specification. */
21#include "xsetenv.h"
22
23#include "setenv.h"
24#include "error.h"
25#include "exit.h"
26#include "gettext.h"
27
28#define _(str) gettext (str)
29
30
31/* Set NAME to VALUE in the environment.
32 If REPLACE is nonzero, overwrite an existing value.
33 With error checking. */
34void
35xsetenv (const char *name, const char *value, int replace)
36{
37 if (setenv (name, value, replace) < 0)
38 error (EXIT_FAILURE, 0, _("memory exhausted"));
39}
40
